item.title: Federal Reserve's Mester: Inflation Appears to Be Approaching 3%
item.description: August 14: Mester of the Federal Reserve stated that inflation seems to be approaching 3%. Tariffs are being passed on to inflation. The majority of the tariff's impact on inflation is anticipated to wane within 6 to 9 months, yet it may also persist for a longer duration. (FX168)

item.title: US Stock Company Jeffs'Brands Launches Cryptocurrency Asset Management Plan, Commits to Allocate $75 Million
item.description: On August 14th, the Nasdaq-listed e-commerce company Jeffs'Brands made an announcement about the launch of a cryptocurrency asset management strategic plan, with an allocation of up to $75 million. The fund plan will mainly focus on optimizing the yields of five major cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and stablecoins. The fund will be managed by Quantum Crypto, which is a subsidiary of Tectona Ltd, an Israeli publicly traded cryptocurrency company. Additionally, Tectona Ltd holds a 41% stake in the Israeli regulated cryptocurrency exchange platform, Horizon.

item.title: Trump: Possible Agreement with Putin
item.description: August 14th: Trump expressed that in relation to his meeting with Putin, he has the belief that an agreement could be reached with Putin. (Regarding foreign exchange)

item.title: Ansem: The Altcoin Market Sentiment is at an All-Time Low, Predicting 2025 and 2026 to Be the Most Fruitful Years for Cryptocurrency Assets
item.description: On August 14th, the cryptocurrency key opinion leader (KOL) Ansem posted, saying, "The sentiment in the altcoin market is at an all-time low. Meanwhile, both BTC and ETH have reached all-time highs, and the external attention has also reached an all-time high."He predicted that 2025 and 2026 will be the most prosperous periods for cryptocurrency assets, mainly driven by innovative protocols that gain real-world applications and user recognition.

item.title: Coinbase will undergo maintenance on August 19th
item.description: August 14th. According to official channels, Coinbase is scheduled to undergo maintenance at 8 a.m. on August 19th in Beijing time. During this maintenance period, there will be delays in sending and receiving BTC, LTC, BCH, ZEC, and DASH. Delays will also be experienced for all ERC20 tokens, as well as for sending and receiving on the Ethereum (ETH) and Ethereum Classic (ETC) networks. However, trading will not be impacted.

item.title: Tom Lee: PPI Is Just a Blip, Buy the Dip Has Worked Every Time Since Late 2022
item.description: On August 14th, Tom Lee, the newly appointed chairman of BitMine, tweeted, stating, "Today's 'hot' PPI is merely a sideshow. Since the end of 2022, each dip has been a buying opportunity."

item.title: After the release of the US July PPI data, the probability of a 25 basis point interest rate cut by the Fed in September stands at 92.5%.
item.description: On August 14th, after the release of the U.S. July PPI data, the probability of a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Fed in September slightly decreased to 92.5%, while the probability of keeping the interest rate unchanged was 7.5%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Above $4600
item.description: On August 14th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum has gone up above $4600, and it has a 24-hour decrease of 2.02%.

item.title: Coinbase CEO: Over the past decade, BTC has seen a price increase of 490x, while ETH has seen a price increase of 3,500x
item.description: On August 14th, Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong tweeted the asset performance over the past decade, which includes:· Gold: 201%· S&P 500: 207%· Bitcoin (BTC): 49,000%· Ethereum (ETH): 350,000%

item.title: US Stock Crypto Reserve Concept Stocks Experience Widespread Decline, with Sharplink Falling by 6.29%
item.description: On August 14th, according to the market data of Rockflow, US stock cryptocurrency reserve concept stocks generally declined. This includes:· Sharplink Gaming decreased by 6.29%;· Bitmine dropped by 4.66%;· BTCS fell by 4.83%.· Strategy went down by 2.53%;· Circle increased by 1.55%;· Bullish rose by 4.93%.
